stunden.tooltip: Count all hours, including school hours.

teilzeit.label: How much of full-time do you want to work?

vk.heading: Reasons for shorter training
vk.helper: Choose all options that fit you.

abitur.label: High school diploma / A-levels
abitur.tooltip: If you have a high school diploma, a reduction is possible.

realschule.label: Secondary school diploma
realschule.tooltip: If you have a secondary school diploma, a reduction is possible.

alter21.label: Age over 21 years
alter21.tooltip: For older trainees, prior experience may be credited.

vork.label: Professional experience
vork.tooltip: Practical experience or qualifications may shorten the training duration.

familie.label: Family and care responsibilities
familie.tooltip: If you have family or care responsibilities, a reduction is possible.

res.headline: Your part-time training
res.helper: Here you can see your details and the result.
res.notes:
• This calculation is only a help.
  • The result is not official.
  • Talk about the result with your training company.
  • Part-time training is possible if you do at least 50% of the normal time.
